settings.title: Additional Settings
settings.allowExploreLabel: Allow my public notes to appear in Explore
settings.allowExploreDescription: When turned off, your public notes are still accessible via direct links, but will not be recommended in the Explore page.

oauth.title: Account Linking
oauth.description: Link third-party accounts to enable multiple login methods
oauth.mergeSuccess: Account bound successfully, account data merged

mergeDialog.title: Confirm Account Merge
mergeDialog.description: This account is already linked to another account. After merging, all data (notes, attachments, etc.) from that account will be migrated to your current account, and the original account will be deleted.
mergeDialog.warning: Warning: This operation cannot be undone. Please confirm this is your account.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Deleting your account will permanently delete all your data, including notes, attachments, etc. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.warning: This action will permanently delete your account and all related data, including all notes, attachments, etc. This action cannot be undone. Please proceed with caution.
deleteAccount.passwordLabel: Please enter your password to confirm deletion

setupWizard.title: Rote Setup Wizard
setupWizard.subtitle: Welcome to Rote! Follow the steps to complete the setup

descriptions.frontendUrl: Frontend URL is used to identify your frontend access address and will be used to generate links in RSS feeds. Please enter the complete URL (e.g., https://your-domain.com).
descriptions.s3Optional: S3 storage configuration is optional. You can skip this step and configure it later in system settings. If skipped, the system will not be able to upload attachments, but other features will work normally.

validation.frontendUrlInvalid: Please enter a valid URL (starts with http:// or https://)
validation.urlPrefixInvalid: Please enter a valid URL prefix (starts with http:// or https://)
validation.usernameReserved: This username is reserved and cannot be used. Please choose another username.
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMin: Password length must be at least 6

site.frontendUrlDescription: Frontend access URL, used to generate note links in RSS feeds

storage.title: Storage Configuration
storage.urlPrefixDescription: Public URL prefix for accessing uploaded files (optional)

ui.title: UI Configuration
ui.allowRegistrationDesc: Whether to allow new user registration
ui.allowUploadFileDesc: Whether to allow users to upload attachments
ui.defaultUserRoleDescription: Default role for newly registered users. Only user or moderator can be selected. Admin roles must be assigned manually.
ui.apiRateLimitDescription: Maximum number of requests per second allowed per user or IP address. Used to prevent API abuse. Minimum is 10, default is 100 requests/second.

security.title: Security Configuration
security.description: Configure security-related policies, such as email verification requirements.
security.requireVerifiedEmailForExplore: Only allow users with verified email to appear in Explore
security.requireVerifiedEmailForExploreDesc: When enabled, only users with verified email will have their public notes recommended in the Explore page; existing public notes remain accessible via direct links.

oauth.title: OAuth Login Configuration
oauth.description: Configure third-party OAuth provider login settings, allowing users to login via platforms like GitHub.
oauth.enabledDesc: Allow users to login via third-party OAuth providers (e.g., GitHub)
oauth.disabledHint: OAuth is currently disabled. After configuring providers, enable OAuth login for it to take effect.

providers.enabledDesc: Allow users to login with {{provider}} account

github.enabledDesc: Allow users to login with GitHub account
github.callbackUrlDesc: Note: This URL is the backend URL. Callback URL configured in GitHub OAuth App, typically: https://yourdomain.com/v2/api/auth/oauth/github/callback.

apple.enabledDesc: Allow users to login with Apple account
apple.callbackUrlDesc: Note: This URL is the backend URL. Callback URL configured in Apple Developer, typically: https://yourdomain.com/v2/api/auth/oauth/apple/callback.

users.title: User Management
users.description: Manage all users in the system
users.searchPlaceholder: Search by username, email, or nickname

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm User Deletion
deleteConfirm.description: This action cannot be undone and will permanently delete the user and all their data.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.welcome: Welcome to Rote (hereinafter referred to as "the App"). We take your privacy very seriously. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and share your personal information, as well as the rights you have. Please read this policy carefully before using the App.

informationCollection.title: 1. Information We Collect and Purposes
informationCollection.description: To provide you with our services, we may collect the following types of information, and will only use them for the clear and specific purposes described:

accountInfo.label: Account Information
accountInfo.content: Username, securely encrypted password, and email address you provide during registration, used for creating your account, login verification, password recovery, and sending important service-related notices.

userContent.label: User Content
userContent.content: Notes, images, tags, comments, and other content you create, upload, or store while using the App, used only to provide you with note-taking, storage, synchronization, and (when you choose to make content public) sharing features.

profile.label: Profile Information
profile.content: Nickname, bio, avatar, and similar information you fill in on your profile page, used for in-app identity display and basic social interaction.

deviceInfo.label: Device and Log Information
deviceInfo.content: We may collect anonymized or de-identified data such as device model, operating system version, IP address, browser information, and crash logs, used only for security protection (e.g., detecting abnormal behavior, preventing abuse) and app performance analysis, not for identifying your real-world identity.

informationUsage.title: 2. How We Use Information
informationUsage.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes and will not go beyond the scope described in this policy:

provideService.label: Provide Core Services
provideService.content: To provide you with core features such as note creation, storage, synchronization, and sharing (when you choose to make content public).

security.label: Security and Maintenance
security.content: To monitor abnormal behavior, prevent fraud and abuse, protect the security of your account and data, and analyze crash reports and error logs to improve and optimize the App.

communication.label: Communication
communication.content: To send you important service-related notifications (such as security alerts and feature updates) and to respond to your inquiries.

informationSharing.title: 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.description: We will not sell your personal information to any third party. We may share your information only under the following limited circumstances:

consent.label: With Your Explicit Consent
consent.content: We will share your information with third parties only after obtaining your explicit, informed consent.

legal.label: Legal and Regulatory Requirements
legal.content: We may disclose your information in accordance with applicable laws, regulations, court orders, or compulsory requirements of competent authorities, under the principles of legality, necessity, and minimal disclosure.

serviceProvider.label: Service Providers
serviceProvider.content: We may use third-party service providers such as cloud service providers or email delivery services to help us operate the App. These providers may access only the minimum necessary information to perform their services and are contractually required to protect your data and not use it for any unrelated purposes.

tracking.title: 4. Tracking Technologies and User Consent
tracking.description: Rote does not currently use third-party ad networks, does not conduct cross-app or cross-website behavioral tracking, and does not use advertising identifiers (such as IDFA) for personalized advertising or user profiling.
tracking.att: If we ever need to use Apple's App Tracking Transparency (ATT) framework in the future for cross-app/website tracking, we will clearly explain the purposes in advance and will only proceed after obtaining your explicit authorization through the system prompt. If you refuse or later revoke permission, we will not perform such tracking or display personalized ads.

storage.label: Data Storage Location
storage.content: By default, your data is stored on servers operated by us and hosted in trusted cloud providers' data centers. If you run a self-hosted deployment, your data will be stored on the servers or cloud environment you configure. In either case, we recommend choosing data center locations that comply with the data protection laws applicable to you.

security.label: Security Measures
security.content: We design the backend with reasonable security measures such as TLS/SSL encrypted transmission, access control, and encrypted password storage to help prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, or tampering. If you self-host the backend, you are also responsible for configuring appropriate security protections for your servers, such as firewalls and access control policies.

retention.label: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to provide the services (i.e., for as long as your account remains active). When you delete data or request account deletion, we will delete or anonymize your related data within a reasonable period, unless a longer retention period is required by applicable law.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.description: You have the following rights with respect to your personal information, and we will respect and support the exercise of these rights in accordance with applicable laws:

access.label: Access and Correction
access.content: You can log in to your account at any time to view and edit your profile and stored content. If you self-host the backend, you may also access and export data directly through database management or backups.

delete.label: Deletion and Account Closure
delete.content: You can delete individual notes or attachments in the App, or request deletion of your account and related data. If you self-host the backend, you can also delete all stored data by destroying servers, storage volumes, or backups under your control.

withdraw.label: Withdraw Consent
withdraw.content: For processing activities based on your consent, you may withdraw your consent at any time. Withdrawal of consent will not affect the lawfulness of processing carried out based on consent before its withdrawal, but may result in some features no longer being available.

policyRevision.title: 7. Privacy Policy Revisions
policyRevision.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time due to changes in laws, regulations, or our services. Updated versions will be published within the App or on related pages. Your continued use of the App after the updated policy takes effect will be deemed as your acceptance of the updated policy. For material changes, we will provide more prominent notice or in-app messages where appropriate.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions regarding this privacy policy or our handling of your personal information, please contact us via:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.welcome: Welcome to Rote (hereinafter referred to as "the App"). This Terms of Service ("Agreement") is a legally binding agreement between you and the developer(s) of Rote ("we" or "us") regarding your use of the App. Please read this Agreement carefully, especially the sections on limitation of liability and dispute resolution. By using the App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all of its terms.

accountCreation.label: 1.1 Account Creation:
accountCreation.content: You represent that you have full legal capacity to enter into this Agreement and agree to provide true, accurate, and complete registration information. You are responsible for keeping your account credentials secure and for all activities that occur under your account.

personalUse.label: 1.2 Personal Use:
personalUse.content: The App is provided for your personal, non-commercial use only. Unless permitted by law or with our prior written consent, you may not rent, lend, transfer, sell, or otherwise make your account available to any third party.

fees.label: 1.3 Fees:
fees.content: The App is currently offered primarily as a free service. If we introduce paid features in the future, we will provide prior notice and clearly explain the pricing, and we will only charge you after you have been fully informed and have agreed.

ugcOwnership.label: 2.1 User-Generated Content (UGC):
ugcOwnership.content: Any content you create, upload, store, or publish in the App (including but not limited to notes, images, and comments, collectively "User Content") remains owned by you or the original rights holder.

license.label: 2.2 License Grant:
license.content: To the extent permitted by law, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to store, back up, display, process, and technically reproduce your User Content solely as necessary to provide and continuously improve the App for you. We will not actively use your content for any purposes beyond those described in this Agreement without your additional consent, and ownership of your content always remains with you.

responsibility.label: 2.3 Responsibility for Content:
responsibility.content: You are solely responsible for your User Content and you represent and warrant that you have all rights necessary to upload, store, and share such content via the App. You agree that your content will not infringe any third party's rights, including but not limited to intellectual property rights, privacy rights, reputation rights, or portrait rights.

conduct.title: 3. Code of Conduct
conduct.intro: When using the App, you must not engage in any unlawful, infringing, or inappropriate behavior, including but not limited to:

illegal.label: 3.1 Illegal Content:
illegal.content: Publishing, transmitting, or storing any content that violates the laws and regulations of the People's Republic of China or other applicable jurisdictions.

infringement.label: 3.2 Infringement:
infringement.content: Infringing any third party's intellectual property or other legal rights (such as copyright, trademark rights, patent rights, privacy rights, or personality rights).

inappropriate.label: 3.3 Inappropriate Content:
inappropriate.content: Posting defamatory, insulting, threatening, pornographic, violent, hateful, discriminatory, or otherwise offensive content, or content that encourages illegal activities.

abuse.label: 3.4 Abuse of Service:
abuse.content: Interfering with or disrupting the normal operation of the App, including but not limited to spreading viruses or malicious code, attacking servers, conducting unauthorized crawling, scanning, testing, or attempting to bypass security measures.

harassment.label: 3.5 Harassment:
harassment.content: Harassing, intimidating, stalking, or otherwise bullying other users in any form.

zeroTolerance.label: 3.6 Zero Tolerance Policy:
zeroTolerance.content: We maintain a Zero Tolerance policy for Objectionable Content and Abusive Users. Any posting, transmission, or storage of objectionable content, including but not limited to pornography, violence, hate speech, discrimination, harassment, threats, defamation, insults, or other inappropriate content, as well as any form of abusive behavior, will result in immediate and severe action upon discovery or report. Such actions may include, but are not limited to, immediate removal of content, permanent account suspension, service termination, and we reserve the right to pursue legal remedies. We do not provide warnings or grace periods for violations of this policy.

conduct.violationHandling: If we discover, or are notified of, any behavior or User Content that appears to violate this Agreement or applicable laws, we may, within a reasonable scope, take measures such as removing or blocking the relevant content, restricting certain features, or suspending or terminating your access to the App, and we reserve the right to pursue legal remedies where permitted by law.

asIs.label: 4.1 "As Is" Basis:
asIs.content: The App is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no express or implied warranties regarding the suitability, reliability, availability, or fitness of the App for any particular purpose, nor any warranties of non-infringement.

interruption.label: 4.2 Service Interruptions:
interruption.content: Due to the nature of internet services, you understand and agree that we may temporarily suspend or discontinue part or all of the services for reasons such as system maintenance, upgrades, network failures, equipment failures, or force majeure events, and we shall not be liable for such interruptions within the scope permitted by law.

liabilityLimit.label: 4.3 Limitation of Liability:
liabilityLimit.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, punitive, or consequential damages (including but not limited to data loss, business interruption, or loss of profits) arising out of or in connection with your use of, or inability to use, the App. For any direct losses that are foreseeable and attributable to us, our aggregate liability shall be limited to the fees (if any) actually paid by you to us for the relevant services during the period in dispute.

modification.label: 5.1 Modifications:
modification.content: We may modify this Agreement from time to time due to operational needs or changes in laws and regulations. Updated versions will be published within the App or on related pages. Your continued use of the App after the updated Agreement takes effect will be deemed as your acceptance of the updated terms.

termination.label: 5.2 Termination of Service:
termination.content: Subject to applicable law, we may at any time suspend or terminate part or all of the services provided to you under reasonable circumstances, and will notify you in advance where feasible. You may also terminate this Agreement at any time by ceasing to use the App and, where available, deleting your account.

dispute.title: 6. Dispute Resolution
dispute.content: This Agreement, including its formation, validity, interpretation, performance, and dispute resolution, shall be governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China (excluding its conflict of law rules). Any dispute arising out of or in connection with your use of the App shall first be resolved through friendly negotiations. If no resolution is reached, either party may bring a lawsuit before a people's court with jurisdiction in the location where the App's developer is based.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions regarding this Agreement, please contact us via:
